verses.verse: So <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had; <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%>

<S%H456>Elihoreph<s%> and <S%H281>Ahiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7894>Shisha,<s%> <S%H5608>scribes;<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud,<s%> the <S%H2142>recorder.<s%>
And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host:<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> were the <S%H3548>priests:<s%>

And <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5324>officers:<s%> and <S%H2071>Zabud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> was <S%H3548>principal<s%> <S%H5324>officer,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7463>friend:<s%>
And <S%H301>Ahishar<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>household:<s%> and <S%H141>Adoniram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5653>Abda<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4522>tribute.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which provided <S%H3557>victuals<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H1004>household:<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> man his <S%H2320>month<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3557>provision.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H8034>names:<s%> The <S%H1133>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%>
The <S%H1128>son<s%> of <S%H1857>Dekar,<s%> in <S%H4739>Makaz,<s%> and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim,<s%> and <S%H1053>Bethshemesh,<s%> and <S%H358>Elonbethhanan:<s%>
The <S%H1136>son<s%> of <S%H2618>Hesed,<s%> in <S%H700>Aruboth;<s%> to him pertained <S%H7755>Sochoh,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher:<s%>

The <S%H1125>son<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5299>region<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor;<s%> which had <S%H2955>Taphath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H802>wife:<s%>

<S%H1195>Baana<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud;<s%> to him pertained <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and <S%H4023>Megiddo,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1052>Bethshean,<s%> which is by <S%H6891>Zartanah<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> from <S%H1052>Bethshean<s%> to <S%H65>Abelmeholah,<s%> even to the place that is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam:<s%>

The <S%H1127>son<s%> of <S%H1398>Geber,<s%> in <S%H7433>Ramothgilead;<s%> to him pertained the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H1568>Gilead;<s%> to him also pertained the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> three <S%H8346>score<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H1280>bars:<s%>
<S%H292>Ahinadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> had <S%H4266>Mahanaim:<s%>
<S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> was in <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> he <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1315>Basmath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> to <S%H802>wife:<s%>
<S%H1195>Baanah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> was in <S%H836>Asher<s%> and in <S%H1175>Aloth:<s%>
<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6515>Paruah,<s%> in <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%>
<S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> in <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%>

<S%H1398>Geber<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri<s%> was in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> and he was the <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H5333>officer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7227>many,<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude,<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> and making <S%H8056>merry.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4910>reigned<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> they <S%H5066>brought<s%> <S%H4503>presents,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H3899>provision<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and three <S%H8346>score<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H7058>meal,<s%>

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> out of the <S%H7471>pastures,<s%> and an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H354>harts,<s%> and <S%H6643>roebucks,<s%> and fallow <S%H3180>deer,<s%> and <S%H75>fatted<s%> <S%H1257>fowl.<s%>

For he had <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the region on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> from <S%H8607>Tiphsah<s%> even to <S%H5804>Azzah,<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river:<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5676>sides<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about him.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H8384>fig<s%> tree, from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H723>stalls<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%> for his <S%H4817>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> provided <S%H3557>victual<s%> for <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7131>came<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H7979>table,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H2320>month:<s%> they <S%H5737>lacked<s%> <S%H3808>nothing.<s%> <S%H1697><s%>

<S%H8184>Barley<s%> also and <S%H8401>straw<s%> for the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7409>dromedaries<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> they to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the officers were, every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4941>charge.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> and <S%H7341>largeness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> even as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7227>excelled<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> country, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For he was <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men;<s%> than <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite,<s%> and <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and <S%H3633>Chalcol,<s%> and <S%H1862>Darda,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4235>Mahol:<s%> and his <S%H8034>fame<s%> was in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.
And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs:<s%> and his <S%H7892>songs<s%> were a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> of <S%H6086>trees,<s%> from the <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> that is in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even to the <S%H231>hyssop<s%> that <S%H3318>springs<s%> out of the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> also of <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and of <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and of <S%H7431>creeping<s%> things, and of <S%H1709>fishes.<s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> of his <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
